name: Pumpkin Blast (Zeldariomon)
description:
You're a pumpkin. Zombies are everywhere but they're eating pumpkins instead of brain. Luckily (or Unluckily) you can EXPLODE and blast those zombies away. 

Enjoy this fun short game where you sacrifice your own health while damaging the zombies. Grab all the candies and increase your health hence survive as long as you can. 

Happy Halloween 🎃
